entry.title: Reusable payment codes
entry.summary: The notification transactions are essential but a privacy concern, as they are required to ensure that no one loses their money if they back up their wallet seed. These transactions could potentially be treated as a backup for clients, but it is not a reliable option. The attached file is a PGP signature with a SHA1 hash. Additionally, there is an attachment named '0xEAD9E623.asc', which is a 18399-byte application/pgp-keys file.
